mapper.select: SELECT contract_id, customer_id, customer_name, insured_id, insured_name, product_id, product_name, reg_date, expired_date, contract_status, premium_amount, payment_cycle, update_date, admin_idx, admin_name FROM ( SELECT c.contract_id, c.customer_id, cu.name AS customer_name, c.insured_id, ins.name AS insured_name, c.product_id, p.productname AS product_name, c.reg_date, c.expired_date, c.contract_status, c.premium_amount, c.payment_cycle, c.update_date, c.admin_idx, ad.admin_name AS admin_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY c.reg_date DESC, c.contract_id DESC) AS rn FROM shez_contracts c INNER JOIN shez_customers cu ON c.customer_id = cu.customer_id INNER JOIN shez_customers ins ON c.insured_id = ins.customer_id INNER JOIN shez_insurances p ON c.product_id = p.productno INNER JOIN shez_admins ad ON c.admin_idx = ad.admin_idx ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} + 1 AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shez_contracts c INNER JOIN shez_customers cu ON c.customer_id = cu.customer_id INNER JOIN shez_insurances p ON c.product_id = p.productno

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT c.contract_id, c.customer_id, cu.name AS customer_name, c.insured_id, ins.name AS insured_name, c.product_id, p.productname AS product_name, c.contract_coverage, c.reg_date, c.expired_date, c.premium_amount, c.payment_cycle, c.contract_status, c.update_date, c.admin_idx, ad.admin_name AS admin_name FROM shez_contracts c INNER JOIN shez_customers cu ON c.customer_id = cu.customer_id INNER JOIN shez_customers ins ON c.insured_id = ins.customer_id INNER JOIN shez_insurances p ON c.product_id = p.productno INNER JOIN shez_admins ad ON c.admin_idx = ad.admin_idx ) WHERE contract_id = #{ctrId}

SELECT customerId, name FROM ( SELECT customer_id AS customerId, name AS name FROM shez_customers
LOWER(name) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{customerName}) || '%'
ORDER BY name ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 50

SELECT productNo, productName, coverageRange FROM ( SELECT productno AS productNo, productname AS productName, coveragerange AS coverageRange FROM shez_insurances
LOWER(productName) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{productName}) || '%'
ORDER BY productName ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 50

SELECT adminIdx, adminName, adminRole FROM ( SELECT admin_idx AS adminIdx, admin_name AS adminName, admin_role AS adminRole FROM shez_admins
LOWER(admin_name) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{adminName}) || '%'
ORDER BY adminName ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 50
